summary.para: The REGFILTER2 structure contains information for registering a filter.

remarks.para: This structure is passed to the method.
If you need to register pin mediums or pin categories, set dwVersion to 2 and use the structure.

summary.para: Filter registration format. If the value is 1, the union contains the first unnamed structure. If the value is 2, the union contains the second unnamed structure.
Filter merit. Filters with higher merit are enumerated first. See Merit.
Number of pins. (Defined only if dwVersion is 1.)
Pointer to an array of structures, of size cPins. (Defined only if dwVersion is 1.)
Number of pins. (Defined only if dwVersion is 2.)
Pointer to an array of structures, of size cPins2. (Defined only if dwVersion is 2.)
